message: Let's split it 50/50, it's a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I deserve the majority!
You're being a bit too generous with yourself, Bob! I'm not accepting this one.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
You're getting closer to a fair deal, but I still want a bit more!
You're not budging, Bob? I'm not going to give you 60%!
I'm getting closer to a fair deal, but I'm still not giving you the majority!
Getting closer to a tie, but I still think I deserve a slight edge!
No way, Bob! I'm not giving you the edge you want!
I'm not budging on the edge, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle!
I'll give you the edge you want, but I'm not going to get left behind!
Alright, deal! You get 58% and I get 42%. Let's split the $100!
